Class PrimaryController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.frontend.controller.PrimaryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PrimaryController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Represents the controller for the primary GUI.

      public void switchToBudget(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches the view to the budget view.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the budget.fxml file cannot be loaded.

    • switchToSettings

      public void switchToSettings(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches to profile settings view.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the settings.fxml file cannot be loaded.

    • onAddIncome

      public void onAddIncome(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action event for adding an income. If there's a selected budget, opens the AddIncomeDialog and adds the income to the budget. If there's no budget, prompts the user to create one.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the "Add Expense" button
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an error during dialog creation or processing

    • onAddExpense

      public void onAddExpense(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action event for adding an expense. If there's a selected budget, opens the AddExpenseDialog and adds the expense to the budget. If there's no budget, prompts the user to create one.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the "Add Expense" button
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an error during dialog creation or processing

    • switchToSavingPlan

      public void switchToSavingPlan(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches the view to the savings plan view.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the savingsPlan.fxml file cannot be loaded.

      public void updatePrimaryLabel()
      Updates the dynamic labels of the view.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller by updating the dynamic labels.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the FXML file that is being loaded.
      resourceBundle - the resource bundle of the FXML file that is being loaded.

    • quitApplication

      public void quitApplication(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event for quitting the application. Displays a confirmation dialog and exits the application if the user confirms.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the "Quit" button
